title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - “It’s the Person, but Then the Environment, Too”: Black and Latino Males’ Narratives about Their College Successes
itunes:title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - “It’s the Person, but Then the Environment, Too”: Black and Latino Males’ Narratives about Their College Successes
description: Author Dr. Derrick R. Brooms discusses his article, ""It's the Person, but Then the Environment, Too": Black and Latino Males' Narratives about Their College Successes," published in the April 2020 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
content:encoded: Author Dr. Derrick R. Brooms discusses his article, ""It's the Person, but Then the Environment, Too": Black and Latino Males' Narratives about Their College Successes," published in the April 2020 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
